DOC.criteria: Pregnancy 34 36 week Confirmed gestational age ( LMP , USG ) Alive fetus Imminent risk preterm delivery Multiple pregnancy Major fetal malformation Comproved fetal lung maturity Maternal fetal indication immediate interruption pregnancy Maternal hemorrhagic syndrome ( placenta previa , abruptio placenta ) Chorioamnionitis Chronic use corticosteroid Previous use corticosteroid fetal lung maturation current pregnancy
